description: Discover the best hotels in St. Paul, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Contemporary Mississippi Riverside Stay in Saint Paul with Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the charm of Minnesota's capital city with a stay at InterContinental Saint Paul Riverfront, an IHG Hotel. Overlooking the mighty Mississippi River, this modern hotel is just steps away from the historic Landmark Center and the vibrant Lowertown district, home to an array of trendy eateries, galleries and boutiques. Enjoy a meal at the hotel's Citizen restaurant, where you can indulge in elevated American-style comfort food while sipping a craft cocktail.

seo.title: Hotels in St. Paul - United States Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
